item.title: Organizing My Ansible Project Into Roles
item.description: Thus far, I’ve been writing ad hoc playbooks and learning how all the pieces go together. It’s been largely disorganized, and I’ve made some structural mistakes in the process. I wanted to take a moment to correct these mistakes, in the hopes of making further progress more efficient. Take a look at the relevant git commit here Overview I’m not going to go into every role in depth, but will pick one or two items I restructured.
